meanings.sent1: The new house was pipeless, so we had to use space heaters.
meanings.sent2: The plumber fixed the pipeless sink in no time.
meanings.sent3: The pipeless playground was surprisingly quiet without the sound of water running.
meanings.sent4: Her pipeless garden was like a canvas waiting for colors to be added.
meanings.sent5: The pipeless room felt strangely empty without the usual hum of water flowing.

meanings.sent1: The pipeless building had a modern design with no visible pipes.
meanings.sent2: The pipeless car was a challenge to repair without the usual piping system.
meanings.sent3: The pipeless birthday cake was a disaster when the candles couldn't be lit.
meanings.sent4: His pipeless speech lacked the usual flow and structure.
meanings.sent5: The pipeless factory seemed incomplete without the network of pipes running overhead.
